channel.title: Wild zones
channel.description: hi all, im coding a server right now, im starting small atm then maybe silab then 508's etc, but right now im having trouble setting the x and y's for a funpk zone, teampk zone, and thats all cuz ill use the level'ed normal wild(level 1 etc) for normal pking, any help/hints on where to look? i already searched forums but cannot find help, some topics i cant read cuz of rep or w/e idk but yea, and i searched client.java for isinwild, and no luck so yea i need some help plz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2009, 10:07:46 pm[/size][hr]i also 4got to mention that im using project 16 v6 as a base and i did find a thing when i searched for isinwild but i cant figure out how it works[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 12:58:37 pm[/size][hr]bump....

item.title: Wild zones
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

hi all, im coding a server right now, im starting small atm then maybe silab then 508’s etc, but right now im having trouble setting the x and y’s for a funpk zone, teampk zone, and thats all cuz ill use the level’ed normal wild(level 1 etc) for normal pking, any help/hints on where to look? i already searched forums but cannot find help, some topics i cant read cuz of rep or w/e idk but yea, and i searched client.java for isinwild, and no luck so yea i need some help plz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2009, 10:07:46 pm[/size][hr]i also 4got to mention that im using project 16 v6 as a base and i did find a thing when i searched for isinwild but i cant figure out how it works[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 12:58:37 pm[/size][hr]bump…
